statements: SELECT * FROM binding_sites_info;
SELECT site_id, protein_id, ligand_name FROM binding_sites_info;
SELECT ligand_name, site_location, protein_id FROM binding_sites_info;
SELECT site_location, protein_id, site_id, ligand_name FROM binding_sites_info ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM binding_sites_info WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM binding_sites_info WHERE protein_id = 1 ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT site_id, protein_id, ligand_name FROM binding_sites_info WHERE site_location LIKE '%active%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT protein_id, COUNT(*) AS site_count FROM binding_sites_info GROUP BY protein_id ORDER BY site_count DESC;
SELECT site_id, ligand_name FROM binding_sites_info WHERE site_location IS NOT NULL AND ligand_name = 'Ligand A' ORDER BY site_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT protein_id FROM binding_sites_info WHERE site_location = 'cytoplasm';
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_name, species FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT protein_name, protein_structure FROM proteins WHERE species = 'Human';
SELECT site_id, site_location, site_sequence FROM binding_sites;
SELECT * FROM binding_sites WHERE site_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM binding_sites WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT site_id, site_location FROM binding_sites WHERE site_sequence LIKE '%TGT%' ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT protein_name, species FROM proteins WHERE species = 'Human';
SELECT b.site_id, p.protein_name, p.species FROM binding_sites b JOIN proteins p ON b.protein_id = p.protein_id;
SELECT protein_id, COUNT(site_id) AS site_count FROM binding_sites GROUP BY protein_id HAVING site_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM binding_sites;
SELECT site_id, binding_energy FROM binding_sites WHERE protein_id=123;
SELECT protein_name, organism_name FROM proteins ORDER BY protein_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE molecular_weight > 500 ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, protein_name, gene_name FROM drugs JOIN proteins ON drugs.target_protein_id = proteins.protein_id;
SELECT * FROM binding_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_id, protein_id, site_sequence FROM binding_sites WHERE binding_energy > 5.0 ORDER BY site_id DESC;
SELECT protein_name, organism_name, gene_name FROM proteins WHERE protein_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT drug_name, molecular_weight FROM drugs WHERE molecular_weight BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT protein_id, COUNT(*) as sites_count FROM binding_sites GROUP BY protein_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY sites_count DESC;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, binding_site FROM ProteinInfo;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, molecular_weight, drug_target FROM DrugInfo ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT site_name, site_description FROM BindingSite WHERE site_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT protein_name, drug_name, binding_strength FROM ProteinDrugBinding WHERE binding_strength > 10;
SELECT * FROM ProteinInfo CROSS JOIN DrugInfo;
SELECT * FROM ProteinInfo;
SELECT protein_name, binding_site FROM ProteinInfo ORDER BY protein_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, molecular_weight, drug_target FROM DrugInfo WHERE molecular_weight > 100 ORDER BY molecular_weight DESC;
SELECT site_name, site_description FROM BindingSite WHERE LENGTH(site_description) > 50 ORDER BY site_name ASC;

SELECT p.protein_name, d.drug_name, pb.binding_strength FROM ProteinInfo p JOIN ProteinDrugBinding pb ON p.protein_id = pb.protein_id JOIN DrugInfo d ON d.drug_id = pb.drug_id WHERE pb.binding_strength > 0.5 ORDER BY pb.binding_strength DESC;
SELECT * FROM proteins ORDER BY protein_name DESC;
SELECT id, protein_name, gene_name FROM proteins WHERE organism_name='Human' AND gene_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM proteins WHERE LENGTH(protein_sequence) > 100;
SELECT drug_name, drug_class FROM drugs ORDER BY drug_class, drug_name;
SELECT drug_name, drug_target, drug_structure FROM drugs WHERE drug_target='Kinase';
SELECT * FROM binding_sites WHERE site_name = 'Active Site' AND site_location LIKE '%pocket%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT protein_name, organism_name, gene_name FROM proteins WHERE protein_name LIKE '%kinase%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT drug_name, drug_class FROM drugs WHERE drug_class = 'Antibiotic' AND drug_target = 'DNA Gyrase' ORDER BY drug_name ASC;
SELECT protein_name, drug_name, affinity FROM proteins p INNER JOIN interactions i ON p.id = i.protein_id INNER JOIN drugs d ON i.drug_id = d.id WHERE affinity > 8 ORDER BY protein_name, drug_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_experiments, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY experiment_date ORDER BY experiment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
